welcome to c-NOMIS help

Welcome to the National Offender Management Information System ( c-NOMIS)!

c-NOMIS was developed by Syscon Justice Systems Ltd. to provide computerised record management for correctional and probationary facilities.

Records of admission and custodial functions, outstanding charges, sentence administration, case management, trust accounting, commissary operations, post-release management, video imaging and much more are all at your finger tips.

This system comes complete with a user friendly HTML based Help file, an indispensable resource which provides detailed instructions on how to perform your day-to-day tasks using c-NOMIS. To print a specific module, click here.
